thread.title: Celine Dion adds extra Manchester Arena date - how to get tickets
thread.title_full: Celine Dion adds extra Manchester Arena date - how to get tickets

author: Denise Evans
title: Celine Dion adds extra Manchester Arena date - how to get tickets
text:
Get What's On updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Celine Dion has added an extra Manchester Arena date to her tour. 
The superstar will play a second show on August 1, after the first concert on June 25 sold out in minutes. 
The Canadian singer announced a four-date UK tour earlier this month, sending her fans into a frenzy. 
They are the first UK concerts since 2008, as the My Heart Will Go On singer decides to take a break from her lucrative Las Vegas residency to hit the road across Europe. 
Celine will also play an extra date each in London and Birmingham. Read More Celine Dion in Manchester - how to get tickets 
The 48-year-old promises the show will be a real trip down memory lane, featuring dozens of smash hits from throughout her incredible 30-year career in music - which has included massive soft rock anthems All By Myself, It’s All Coming Back To Me Now, That’s The Way It Is and uptempo number I'm Alive. 
She is now the highest earning live act in Vegas since Elvis Presley and has sold 250 million albums - records that have scooped her five Grammys, two Academy Awards, seven American Music Awards, 20 Junos in Canada, and 40 Felix Awards in her native Quebec. 
For tickets to the August 1 concert at Manchester Arena, click here or for Ticketmaster, book tickets here or contact 0844 844 0444. Read More
